Oct. 4, 2008 D West Wales BBA Contest (Third Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-third-section
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Alexander Rees, Soprano, City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Prizes - 1st £180, 2nd £125, 3rd £110. 6 bands competed.
